attributes.action: to reduce Alcohol duty, now VAT has increased to 17.5%, please deduct the duty which was levied when vat was reduced to 15%.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When VAT was temporarily reduced to 15%, the Chancellor added 2% duty to Alchohl to offset the reduction in tax collected.  Now that VAT has been increased to 17.5% again this hidden tax has not been removed - hence recent rises in your alcohol costs.  Sign the petition at the link below to have this stealth tax removed!
